ygData.subject: Re: AntiMagic Aria - Anyone figure out what it actually does yet?
ygData.msgSnippet: i thought our level 22 Alenia s Disenchanting Melody song did that. Shada
ygData.messageBody:
i thought our level 22 Alenia's Disenchanting Melody song did that.

Shada

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Schafer, Timothy L 1425 [mailto:Timothy.Schafer@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, June 23, 1999 11:05 AM
> To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
> Subject: Re: [eqbards] AntiMagic Aria - Anyone figure out what it
> actually does yet?
>
>
> From: "Schafer, Timothy L 1425" <Timothy.Schafer@...>
>
> I thought this was supposed to be an area effect Cancel Magic
> spell, it
> wouldn't keep the casters from casting, but I thought that it
> would remove
> what ever effects that your party had had cast on them.
>
> Wenaddar
>
>
> > -----Original Message-----
> > From: Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)
> [SMTP:Michael.Garramone@...]

> >

> >

> petitioned a while

> too (like that
> > helps).
> >
> > Shada Silverleaf, Level 46 Bard, Mithaniel Marr

> > > to do?
> > >
